item.title: 日本选民前往投票站，石破茂的首相职位岌岌可危
item.description: 日本选民将在周日举行的上议院选举中对首相石破茂执政 10 个月的情况作出评判，这次选举是在对通货膨胀和与美国关税谈判悬而未决的不满情绪一触即发的情况下举行的。【原文：Japan’s voters will deliver a verdict on Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba’s 10 months in office on Sunday, in an upper house election that takes place amid simmering discontent over inflation and unresolved negotiations with the US on tariffs.】

item.title: 英国政府承诺到 2030 年将污水溢出量减半
item.description: 随着整治污水处理行业的压力增大，英国政府做出了到 2030 年将污水污染减半的新承诺。【原文：The UK government has made a new commitment to cut sewage pollution in half by 2030 as pressure to fix the industry ramps up.】

item.title: 欧洲央行在特朗普贸易战的阴影下不会退缩
item.description: 欧洲中央银行很可能会对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税所带来的经济危险保持沉默，选择将可能的借贷成本下调留待下一天进行。【原文：The European Central Bank is likely to stare down the economic danger posed by US President Donald Trump’s tariffs by opting to leave a potential cut in borrowing costs for another day.】

item.title: 据说珀闻即将达成收购软件公司 SoftNext 股份的交易

item.title: 婴儿潮一代现在与全美大学的 18 岁学生比邻而居
item.description:
在美国学生注册人数不断减少、学校经费紧张、人口迅速老龄化的背景下，学校与老年生活的不同寻常的融合正获得越来越广泛的吸引力。【原文：

At a time of dwindling US student enrollment, tight school finances and a rapidly aging population, the unusual mashup of schools and senior living is gaining wider appeal.

item.title: 伊朗最大炼油厂火势得到控制：国家媒体
item.description: 据伊朗国家媒体报道，伊朗最大的原油加工厂--阿巴丹炼油厂周六发生的火灾已得到控制，没有中断运营。【原文：A fire that broke out on Saturday at Iran’s Abadan Oil Refinery, the country’s largest crude oil processing facility, has been brought under control without disrupting operations, state media reported.】

item.title: 股市狂飙之后，盈利不佳面临惩罚
item.description: 第二季度财报季已拉开序幕，消费者的力量推动了企业利润的恢复性增长。然而，股市的反应却相当平静，这是一个不祥之兆，表明大部分好消息都已被定价，投资者正在对失望进行惩罚。【原文：The second-quarter earnings season is off to a ripping start, with consumer strength powering resilient corporate profits. In the stock market, however, the reaction has been fairly quiet, an ominous sign that much of the good news is priced in — and investors are punishing disappointments.】

item.title: 特朗普会引发中印 "龙象探戈 "吗？
item.description: 在政治形象中使用动物性隐喻的远不止中国。毕竟，俄罗斯有凶猛的熊，美国有高飞的鹰，英国有勇敢的斗牛犬。但说到意象，龙是最难超越的。【原文：China is far from being alone when it comes to using animalistic metaphors in its political imagery. After all, Russia has its ferocious bear, the US its high-flying eagle and the British their plucky bulldog. But when it comes to imagery, it’s kind of hard to top a dragon.】

item.title: 中国在西藏启动备受争议的大型水坝项目
item.description: 据官方新华社报道，中国国务院总理李强周六启动了西藏雅鲁藏布江下游特大型水坝项目建设，计划总投资1.2万亿元人民币（约合1,670亿美元）。【原文：Chinese Premier Li Qiang launched construction of a mega-dam project in the lower reaches of the Yarlung Tsangpo river in Tibet on Saturday, with a total planned investment of 1.2 trillion yuan ($167 billion), according to the official Xinhua News Agency.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》称，汇丰银行在难以填补候选名单的情况下重新开始寻找主席人选
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周六报道，汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）因未能找到足够满意的候选人进入最终候选名单，正在重新物色新的董事会主席人选。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc is refreshing its search for a new board chairman after it couldn’t find enough satisfactory candidates for a final shortlist, the Financial Times reported Saturday.】

item.title: 尼日利亚货币政策委员会委员认为 "被低估 "的奈拉今年将反弹
item.description: 尼日利亚中央银行货币政策委员会的一位成员表示，尼日利亚奈拉被低估了，预计今年会在财政和货币条件改善的情况下反弹。【原文：The Nigerian naira is undervalued and expected to rally this year amid improvements in fiscal and monetary conditions, according to a member of the central bank’s monetary policy committee.】

item.title: 台风逼近香港，国泰航空取消周日航班
item.description: 由于热带气旋 "韦帕 "逼近香港，国泰航空公司周日推迟和取消了进出香港的航班。【原文：Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd. delayed and canceled flights in and out of Hong Kong on Sunday as tropical cyclone Wipha approaches the city.】

item.title: 全球经济图表：关税对美国消费者的涓滴影响
item.description: 最新的美国通胀报告是迄今为止最明显的迹象，表明关税正开始提高普通进口消费品的成本，而汽车价格的下降则抑制了整体通胀。【原文：The latest report on US inflation was the clearest sign yet that tariffs are starting to boost costs of commonly imported consumer goods, while a decline in car prices kept overall inflation in check.】

item.title: 中国誓言对走私关键矿产 "零容忍
item.description: 中国当局誓言对战略矿物走私 "零容忍"，并表示将加强执法，打击非法运输和未经授权转让相关技术的行为。【原文：Chinese authorities vowed “zero tolerance” for the smuggling of strategic minerals and saidd it would strengthen law-enforcement to crack down on illegal shipments and the unauthorized transfer of related technology.】

item.title: 奇货可居：美联储的损失可能已经造成 (播客)
item.description: 美国总统向美联储施压要求其降低利率的历史由来已久，但其手法往往比较隐蔽或以某种方式悄无声息地进行。在特朗普总统执政期间，对美联储的攻击上升到了一个全新的水平。呼吁美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔降息的不仅仅是特朗普。他的其他政府成员（以及国会中的盟友）也一直在就政策以及与货币政策无关的话题对他进行抨击，例如装修成本、货币政策和经济增长。【原文：There’s a long history of US presidents putting pressure on the Federal Reserve to lower interest rates, but the techniques have often been subtle or quiet in some way. Under President Trump, attacks on the Fed have risen to a whole new level. And it’s not just Trump that’s called on Chair Jerome Powell to cut rates. Other members of his administration (along with allies in Congress) have been hammering him both on policy and also topics unrelated to monetary policy, such as the cost of renovati】

item.title: 米兰腐败案调查为城市房地产繁荣蒙上阴影
item.description: 过去十年来，米兰一直处于非同寻常的房地产繁荣之中。现在，针对该市房地产业的大规模腐败调查有可能给意大利的金融之都蒙上一层阴影。【原文：For the past decade Milan has been in the grip of an extraordinary property boom. Now, a sprawling corruption probe into the city’s real estate industry threatens to cast a shadow over Italy’s financial capital.】

item.title: 中国捍卫增长模式，计划将消费作为更大驱动力

item.title: 欧洲央行最新利率制定者曾目睹世界秩序崩溃

item.title: 安巴尼的吉奥公司同意与安联集团在印度建立再保险合资企业
item.description: 穆凯什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）的吉奥金融服务有限公司（Jio Financial Services Ltd.）同意与安联集团（Allianz SE）在印度成立一家再保险合资企业，这推动了这位亿万富翁扩大其在该行业影响力的努力。【原文：Mukesh Ambani’s Jio Financial Services Ltd. agreed to form a reinsurance venture with Allianz SE in India, advancing the billionaire’s quest to broaden his reach in the sector.】

item.title: 中国的不作为加深了陷入困境的地产股的危险性
item.description: 投资者对中国开发商股票今年能否反弹越来越持怀疑态度，因为中国政府不愿推出大规模刺激措施，加深了投资者对该行业的悲观情绪。【原文：Investors are growing skeptical that Chinese developer stocks will stage a rebound this year, as Beijing’s reluctance to unleash sweeping stimulus deepens pessimism about the sector.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁、美联储纷争未能打破市场，逻辑占据上风
item.description: 不久前，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的一个帖子就能让华尔街震惊好几天。现在，他威胁要赶走世界上最强大的央行行长，而国债收益率却几乎没有动静。股票继续稳步攀升。避险资产几乎没有动静。【原文：Not long ago, Donald Trump could rattle Wall Street for days with a single post. Now, he threatens to oust the world’s most powerful central banker, and Treasury yields barely twitch. Stocks continue their steady climb. Haven assets hardly stir.】
